div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1652 Naucratis (mod. El Nibeira or El Niqrâsh), 20 km. SE of Damanhûr, (730) 1905 Burial: c. 360 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 83 AR Leontini: 1 tetradr. Messana: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 1 tetradr. Acanthus: 2 tetradr. Athens: 70 tetradr. (5th cent. 68, 4th cent. 2) Aegina: 1 st. Elis: 1 st. ANS 1967.152.333 Barce: 2 tetradr. Cyrene: 3 tetradr. Euesperides: 1 dr. Disposition: London 2 (Athens, ex Langton) † Eddé, RassNum. 1905, pp. 51-5, illus.; Boll. di Num. 1905, p. 129 NC 1906, "Proceedings," p. 14 Regling, ZfN 1927, p. 4
